plot: The film deals with the changing mentality of the new generation, their attitude towards family values and traditions and the requirements of a bridge that can hold them between ethics and modern culture.
title: Sirf Romance: Love by Chance
plot_es: The film deals with the changing mentality of the new generation, their attitude towards family values and traditions and the requirements of a bridge that can hold them between ethics and modern culture.
plot_en: The film deals with the changing mentality of the new generation, their attitude towards family values and traditions and the requirements of a bridge that can hold them between ethics and modern culture.
